Windows 7 users who cant get it to run: right click Stalker_COP in the install folder, click on the "compatibility" tab and then tic off the box at the bottom that says "run as administrator". Should work then.

I'm Win7.  Had similar problems.  This makes ZERO FUCKING SENSE TO ME!!!!....but... this worked :D

"Browse to the user data folder located at C:\Users\[USERNAME]\Documents\S.T.A.L.K.E.R - Call of Pripyat 
or if you're using windows 7 like me, you can just go to Libraries\Documents\S.T.A.L.K.E.R - Call of Pripyat

Then just delete everything in that folder including any subfolders. Then run the game and it should be working."

1 i open .001 with 7zip and follow your instruction

4 try again and this time i copy paste the .iso mounted in %temp% folder, after mount with DMtool and it's ok....
